text: And Moses said wa-qāla or qāla without the ‘and’ ‘My Lord knows best who brings guidance from Him the suffixed pronoun in ‘indihi refers to the Lord and whose man here is a supplement to the previous man will be read takūna or yakūna the sequel of the Blissful Abode that is to say the praiseworthy sequel in the Abode of the Hereafter in other words it is I Moses in both cases and I speak truthfully in what I have brought you. Truly the evildoers the disbelievers will not be successful’.
